snippet.title: ⚒️Blacksmith Simulator⚒️ - Launch Trailer❗️
snippet.description:
⚒️Blacksmith Simulator⚒️ coming to Steam on January 21❗️
Download and play first✅
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1959120/Blacksmith_Simulator/

Forge your destiny in the Blacksmith Simulator Prologue! Craft weapons and tools, manage your workshop, and mine for resources. Serve diverse clients, grow your reputation, and master medieval craftsmanship in this free introduction to the full game. Your journey as a blacksmith begins here!

#blacksmithsimulator #blacksmith #simulator
